name: 'Saudade'
description:
Saudade - the deep emotional state of nostalgic or profound melancholic longing for an absent something or someone that one cares for and/or loves.

JAM THEME - Nothing Stays Forever.

In a series of vignettes about memory, love and loss; you travel down memory lane - revisiting past holidays, interstices in your life infused with a sentiment of joy, resignation, fate and melancholia.
